root.name: Europa Universalis II: Asia Chapters
root.description: Europa Universalis II: Asian Chapters was the original game designed more with the Asian Market in mind. It expanded on the amount of provinces and countries within Asia but had little improvements elsewhere in the game. It also had several Scenerio's aimed at the Asian Market in locations such as China, Japan and Korea.

similar_games.game: Sid Meier's Civilization IV: Beyond the Sword
